t: Dose Amazon accepts CHEWY invoices?
s: Dose Amazon accepts CHEWY invoices for pet supplies. From my point of view Amazon accepts the CHEWY invoices because Amazon accepts distributers invoices and CHEWY is a distributer of all big companies of pet supplies. CHEWY has the distribution of the brand owners of pet supplies.
